name: hvuestart
description: custom my vue-cli TODO 同时启动el和bs两个服务

scripts.el-dev: cd element && npm run dev && explorer 'http://localhost:8085/#/zh-CN/component/installation' && exit 1
scripts.bs-dev: cd bootstrap && npm i && bundle install && npm run docs-serve && explorer 'http://localhost:9001/docs/4.0/components/buttons/' && exit 1
scripts.dev: npm i && npm run el-dev && npm run bs-dev
